questions.title: LLM-First vs Hardcoded Logic at Scale
questions.question: In the context of a 20-step, multi-expert validation workflow orchestrating over a million agents, how should a CEO define the optimal balance between LLM-first reasoning and hardcoded, deterministic logic to maximize reliability, maintainability, and adaptability?
constraints: Workflow must support rapid adaptation to new regulations and markets
System must operate with 99.99% reliability, with sub-100ms step latency
All critical errors must be explainable
Component upgrades should not require full redeployment

questions.title: App Store Distribution & Platform Sovereignty
questions.question: For a company distributing AI agents/services via third-party app stores while striving to retain platform sovereignty and user data control, what multi-disciplinary safeguards and strategies should be implemented in the workflow to ensure legal and technical independence?
constraints: Must comply with jurisdiction-specific privacy laws without duplicating logic
Must allow seamless service continuity in event of deplatforming
Agents must be updatable without violating app store policies

questions.title: Legal Liability & Monetization in Million-Agent Orchestration
questions.question: Within a highly distributed, monetized agent ecosystem orchestrating millions of concurrent workflows, how should CEO-level strategy address attribution of legal liability for errors while designing robust monetization models?
constraints: Must automatically log agent actions for auditability
Support multiple monetization models with accurate micro-action tracking
Liability assignments must withstand cross-jurisdictional challenges

questions.title: Kingly Agent to OS Integration Architecture
questions.question: How would you architect a Kingly agent-to-Kingly OS integration that supports dynamically hot-swappable LPUs, prompt chains, and memory modules with complete backwards compatibility and zero downtime?
constraints: Real-time monitoring and logging for all state
Support future upgrades without system rebuild

questions.title: Performance Optimization for Hallucination-Prone Agent Chains
questions.question: Design a modular optimization framework for high-throughput multi-agent chains prone to LLM hallucinations, minimizing latency while dynamically mitigating accuracy risks.
constraints: Quantify and mitigate hallucination risks with live feedback

questions.title: Enterprise Integration for Non-Agent-Ready Organizations
questions.question: Design a 20-step workflow for integrating agent-driven automation into an enterprise with deep legacy infrastructure and siloed workflows that is not agent-ready.

questions.title: Cross-Platform Agent Packaging Innovation
questions.question: Using SCAMPER methodology, how can we revolutionize agent packaging and sharing across platforms while maintaining security, versioning, and dependency management?

questions.title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning
questions.question: Apply SCAMPER to design a breakthrough approach for privacy-preserving federated learning across millions of agents without sacrificing model quality or training speed.
constraints: No raw data leaves local agents

questions.title: Agent Platform Release Timing
questions.question: Using 10-10-10 analysis, when should Kingly release its agent platform considering current AI regulation uncertainty, competitor movements, and technology maturity?

questions.title: Agent Marketplace Positioning
questions.question: Conduct a SWOT analysis for launching a decentralized agent marketplace competing with centralized platforms while maintaining sovereignty principles.

questions.title: Agent Chain Failure Modes
questions.question: Using reverse brainstorming, identify all the ways a complex agent chain could catastrophically fail and design preemptive safeguards.

questions.title: Performance Bottleneck Investigation
questions.question: Analyze why agent response times degrade exponentially when handling more than 1000 concurrent requests despite having sufficient compute resources.

questions.title: Quick Agent Debugging Tools
questions.question: Brainstorm innovative approaches for debugging agent conversations in production without violating user privacy.

questions.title: Immediate Scale Fix
questions.question: A critical agent service is failing under load during a product launch. Design an immediate fix that can be deployed in under 30 minutes.

questions.title: Raspberry Pi to Global Scale
questions.question: Design a complete bootstrap path for Kingly from a single Raspberry Pi to supporting millions of agents globally while maintaining sovereignty.

nuclear_stress_tests.reference: See nuclear-stress-tests.json for complete apocalyptic scenarios
nuclear_stress_tests.warning: These tests may cause beautiful system failures
